validators.expression: $exists(startTime) and $exists(startDate) and $toMillis(startDate & 'T' & startTime & '+10:00', "[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]T[H01]:[m01]:[s01][Z]") < $millis() ? 'Start time cannot be in the past' : ''

$exists(startTime) and $exists(endTime) and $exists(endDate) and $toMillis(startDate & 'T' & startTime, "[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]T[H01]:[m01]:[s01]") >= $toMillis(endDate & 'T' & endTime, "[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]T[H01]:[m01]:[s01]") ? 'Must be later than start time' : ''

insidePermitPeriod and $exists(startTime) and $exists(endTime) and $exists(endDate) and $exists(fpAndTFBStatus) and fpAndTFBStatus='permits_required' and $toMillis(endDate & 'T' & endTime, "[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]T[H01]:[m01]:[s01]") >= $toMillis(startDate & 'T' & '23:59:59', "[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]T[H01]:[m01]:[s01]") ? 'End time cannot be after midnight in a permit period' : ''

adornments.helpText: The estimated total area of your fire. This is measured in cubic metres or hectares.

validators.expression: $exists(area) and $exists(isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed) and $exists(fireUnitSize) and fireUnitSize='CubicMetres' and isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true and area<=1 ? 'You cannot enter an area size less than or equal to 1m3' : ''
$exists(area) and area<=0 ? 'Please enter an area size greater than 0' : ''

adornments.helpText: What is the purpose of your burn, i.e. hazard reduction,  land clearing?

displayData.html: For more information on what materials can be burnt visit the EPA website

renderOptions.entryWrapperClass: flex flex-col border w-full p-4 rounded-lg gap-2 shadow cursor-pointer

expr.expression: fpAndTFBStatus='no_restriction' ?[    'Grass',     isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? 'BushScrub' : null,    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true and fireUnitSize='CubicMetres' ? 'LogHeaps' : null,    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true and fireUnitSize='CubicMetres' ? 'LoggingSlash' : null,    $exists(fireUnitSize)=false or fireUnitSize!='Hectares' ? 'GardenWaste' : null,    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ?  'CropResidue': null,    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? null : 'DomesticFirePot',    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? null : 'WoodfiredCooker',    $exists(fireUnitSize)=false or fireUnitSize!='Hectares' ? 'Bonfire' : null,    'Other'] : fpAndTFBStatus='permits_required'?[    'Grass',     isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? 'BushScrub' : null,    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? 'LogHeaps' : null,    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? 'LoggingSlash' : null,    'GardenWaste',    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ?  'CropResidue': null,      isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? null : 'DomesticFirePot',    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? null : 'WoodfiredCooker',    isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? null : 'Bonfire',    'Other'] : null

displayData.text: Solid fuels only, EPA regulations apply to burning garden or other waste

renderOptions.entryWrapperClass: flex flex-col border w-full p-4 rounded-lg gap-2 shadow cursor-pointer

expr.expression:
fpAndTFBStatus='no_restriction'
? isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true 
    ? fireUnitSize='CubicMetres'? ['Cut','Piles','Standing'] : ['Cut','Standing']
    : ['Piles']
: fpAndTFBStatus='permits_required'
    ? isYourFireLargerThan1MeterCubed=true ? ['Cut','Piles','Standing'] : ['Piles']
: null

displayData.text: Burning on properties less that 2000m² in size is governed by EPA regulations and Local Government by-laws.
Please list any supporting organisation / fire brigade that will be in attendance to support your burning activity.

displayData.html: I confirm that the information provided is true to the best of my knowledge.

validators.expression: acknowledgement= true ? '' : 'Please acknowledge the information you have provided is true'
